definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: The Ci poem writer Han Yuanji and his son Han Biao were effective litterateurs at Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 韩元吉和韩淲是南宋词坛的一对父子作家。

sentences.english: The other snipes in the bid group are cancelled as soon as one of them is won.
sentences.chinese: 其他斯奈普斯在申办小组取消尽快其中一人是韩元。

sentences.english: The total company budget for the mill project is KRW 100 billion.
sentences.chinese: 厂项目公司总预算是100亿元韩元。

sentences.english: “The most critical factor is whether the won remains atthe current level, ” Cho said.
sentences.chinese: “最重要的因素是韩元是否保持目前的汇率”赵说。

sentences.english: During checkout you will have the opportunity to increase the quantities of any items won.
sentences.chinese: 退房时，你将有机会以增加数量的任何物品韩元。

sentences.english: Choi Ji-woo also the first time to contribute 200 million won.
sentences.chinese: 崔智友也在第一时间就捐款2亿韩元。

definition: Japanese yen (unit of currency)/also written 日圓|日圆
peso (currency in Latin America) (loanword)/also written 比索[bi3 suo3]
